'''penadar''' "fatherless"<ref>[[Parma Eldalamberon 17]]</ref>
==Etymology==
The noun ''[[adar]]'' and prefix ''[[pen-]]'' translated as "-less".
==Other forms==
*''Ben-adar'' (lenited form) part of the name of [[Tom Bombadil]]
